name: Wound Paste
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Hobgoblins/New Racial Rules/Hobgoblin Magic Items/Wound Paste

sections.body: Prized by slavers as an affordable way to stop a captive from bleeding to death, a dose of wound paste acts as a stabilize spell when slathered on a dying creature. Applying wound paste is a standard action that provokes an attack of opportunity. A pot of wound paste contains 5 doses.
